name: Disco Hippo
description:
Hey, you little hippo with a jetpack!

Are you skilled and fast enough to collect the most socks?

Check out if you can become the world's number one!

Super simple to play, yet hard to master. You are a little hippo that flies around to find her missing sock as the obstacles grow bigger and the time runs out!
Try getting into the DISCO MODE by moving around without touching any obstacles. This will boost your speed, get you bonus socks and even more time.

In Disco Hippo, everyone can win and become better!

Download and have fun!
